Properties.topComment: Very good place for keeping up with your fitness
Properties.author: Michal Skold

Properties.topComment: I really enjoy going to this gym, the equipment is nice and the facilities are great! A massive thank you to Kay, my personal trainer, he is the best person around. Very bubbly, friendly, funny and professional! I do enjoy our sessions together. He is very knowledgeable and can motivate anyone! I recommend him 100%!
Properties.author: Diana Michalcea

Properties.topComment: Enjoyed my first visit but it is incredibly small. It was not busy AT ALL bc of the England game, but even then, we had to wait to be able to use equipment. Not enough sadly, gym is too small.
Properties.author: Ryan Entwistle

Geometry.address: Park Royal Leisure Park, Western Ave W3 0PA

Properties.topComment: Nice place, good staff, lovely manager, perfect place to training.
Properties.author: Francisco Roig Morcilo

Properties.topComment: Decent gym .. very clean and good equipment
Properties.author: David Johnston

Properties.topComment: Great trainers who are friendly and with a how can I help attitude. No doubt that the gym manager has been working hard to get the gym in such an efficient condition as there are rarely any issues or machines not working.
Properties.author: Laura London

Properties.topComment: Well equipped, plenty of options, not too busy but busy enough to motivate, and most importantly- very clean!
Properties.author: Noam Sarfati

Geometry.address: 25 Jerdan Place, Fulham Place, Fulham Island SW6 1BE

Properties.topComment: Nice environment when not full, I go at 1 pm
Properties.author: Felix Pereira

Properties.topComment: 5 stars for their service from staff; Lum, Austin, Victoria, Martin and Andy. Keep up the good work!
Properties.author: Kaphil Lakhani

Properties.topComment: Really good space to train. Clean, and the stations are well set out. The staff are super friendly.
Properties.author: Kaye De Lacey

Geometry.address: The South Kensington Estate, 63-81 Pelham Street SW7 2NJ
